1. Create a new Approved Email document by uploading the HTML file and completing the metadata
2. Upload Reference Documents and Materials
3. Create relationships:
- Email Template - Email Fragment(s), Template Fragment and
- Email Template, Email Fragment - Reference Document(s), Material (Promotional Piece(s)
4. Approve Reference Documents and Materials (Promotional Pieces)
5. Approve (or Stage) Email Templates, Email Fragments and Template Fragments
6. Perform a sync in Veeva CRM to publish content and meta-data to Veeva CRM
